pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto ucce mañce sayati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.3: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto yenāyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa vihāro tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.4: Addasā kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.7: Atha kho bhagavā tatova paṭinivattitvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.9: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.11: “Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena, aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā; taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.4: cattāro mañcā— masārako, bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako, āhaccapādako.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.6: cattāri pīṭhāni— masārakaṃ, bundikābaddhaṃ, kuḷīrapādakaṃ, āhaccapādakaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.9: Aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena, aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.11: taṃ atikkāmetvā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena chinditvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.12: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.13: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.14: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.15: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.16: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.17: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.2.4: aññena kataṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ paṭilabhitvā chinditvā paribhuñjati,
